name: Pixstellar
description:
Just a small Hypercasual Game. I will try to add more features to it but let's see what happens. It was made possible using the GDScript. There's still a lot more to learn and I will definitely improve with time.

INSTRUCTION: 

In order to shoot you must keep moving. If you stop moving you can't shoot. Various Powerups are available and Ammo is limited (You won't run out of it though. Ammo Refills appear frequently. But then again, who knows ?)
